lines.text: I'm the leader here. Do you hear me? I'm the leader here!
If the Nazis march in here in Skokie, you can believe me I will be there. I will be there with baseball bats, with a gun, with anything. I will be in Skokie if the Nazis will march.
Doesn't it feel kind of funny?
I mean, you argued the first amendment for us before. In 68, the democratic convention. It's kind of surprising finding you arguing for prior restraint.
Well, it's surprising to find you, a Jew, arguing in the defense of a Nazi like Collin.
